------=_Part_1602964_1699261787.1486026620506
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I thought this ECAL's call for tutorials may be of interest to some of you.=
=C2=A0CheersNicolas


=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3DCall for Tutorials - E=
uropean Conference on Artificial Life - ECAL 2017=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=
=3D-=3D
ECAL 2017, September 4-8, 2017, Lyon (France).https://project.inria=
.fr/ecal2017/

DEADLINES:
Tutorial proposal deadline: February 8th, 2017Tut=
orial acceptance decision: March 8th, 2017Date of the conference: September=
 4-8th, 2017

DESCRIPTION:
Tutorials at ECAL will cover any topics related =
to the artificial life conferences (ECAL or ALIFE). They will be presented =
by experts in the domain, and will address either beginner, intermediate or=
 advanced levels.=C2=A0
ECAL will provide a 2-hour slot for each tutorial. =
It is suggested that a tutorial fits within one slot, but two slots may be =
allocated if clearly motivated. Tutorials will take place in parallel with =
the conference tracks.
The organisers of accepted tutorials are responsible=
 for:=C2=A0- publicity- tutorial content and delivery
The ECAL 2017 committ=
ee provides:=C2=A0- suitable seminar room space (standard rooms for tutoria=
ls should fit approx. 30 attendees, please tell us if you expect more)- pre=
sentation equipment- catering- web hosting for a 250 word summary of the tu=
torial

SUBMISSION PROCESS:
A one-page description that should contain:- Ti=
tle- Name, affiliation and contact details of the organizers- A description=
 of the tutorial (half a page), including: (1) scope (2) level (beginner, i=
ntermediate, expert) (3) Target audience and why it is relevant to ECAL 201=
7- List of speakers (if different from organisers)- A draft of the outline =
of the tutorial (big ideas, general outline)
A short bio of (each of) the t=
utorial presenter(s) (one page)
Also, if applicable, please provide:descrip=
tion of (software or hardware) demos and/or interactive activityprevious oc=
currences of this tutorial (dates, venues, and number of attendees)link to =
the slides (PDF) of the previous occurrences (draft is also ok)
Tutorial pr=
oposals will be reviewed on the basis of relevance of the topic, targeted a=
udience, expertise of the presenters, and available time slots.
Please subm=
it your tutorial proposal to:
Nicolas Bredeche (Universit=C3=A9 Pierre et M=
arie Curie)Tutorial chair at ECAL 2017E-mail: ecal2017-tutorials@...
Y=
our submission should be sent in a document either in plain text or PDF (ex=
clusively). Please add the following prefix in the subject line of your e-m=
ail: [ECAL2017-tutorial]
We look forward to seeing you in Lyon in 2017!
=3D=
-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D-=3D
